alert.note: Alert for Eastern Rensselaer; Eastern Schenectady; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Saratoga; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer; Southern Saratoga; Southern Washington; Western Rensselaer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 19 at 10:34AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...LAKE EFFECT SNOW BAND... HAZARDS...A lake effect snow band accompanied by winds of up to 40 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than a quarter of a mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 1033 AM EDT, a lake effect snow band was along a line extending from near Galway to near Dolgeville and moving east at 30 MPH. LOCATIONS IMPACTED INCLUDE... Saratoga Springs, Gloversville, Johnstown, Mechanicville, Hoosick Falls, Ballston Spa, Dolgeville, Cambridge, Greenwich, Broadalbin, Hagaman, Edinburg, Northville, Mayfield, Round Lake, Stratford, Galway, Northampton Beach Public Campground, Rock City Falls and Country Knolls. This includes Interstate 87 between exits 11 and 16. SAFETY INFO... Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
